text: Doménica Cristina Tabacchi Rendón Doménica Cristina Tabacchi Rendón (born February 21, 1973) is an Ecuadorian journalist and politician. She currently serves as Vice mayor of Guayaquil, which is Ecuador's largest city, being the first woman ever to obtain the charge.Wendy Salazar: Cara a Cara con Doménica Tabacchi (Spanish). In: Revista Hogar of 12 December 2012. Accessed on 29 June 2015. == References == Category:1973 births Category:Ecuadorian journalists Category:Ecuadorian women in politics Category:Living people Category:People from Guayaquil Category:21st-century women politicians Category:Women journalists
title: Doménica Tabacchi
